title: Two storied house with 3 Bedrooms
location: Off Greenland Mawatha/Anderson Road, Nedimala, Dehiwala
details:
3 large Bedrooms with 3 bathrooms on two floors.

On the ground floor: Living cum Dining; 1 Bed Room and Bath room; Tekwood fitted Mahogany Pantry with Elba Gas Hob & Electric Oven; Outer kitchen for firewood cooking with sink and Chimney; Single garage; Rear veranda with small rear garden; front garden.

On the upper floor: 2 Bed Rooms with 2 attached Bathrooms; TV lounge; Study or Pantry; Rear Balcony;

Flat, higher ground land; clear title (land purchased with NSB loan).

Easy access to Kalubowila Hospital (2 Km); to Dehiwala Junction (2 Km) and Nugegoda junction (3 Km)
